title: How AI converges with Web3: Interview with Footprint Analytics CEO
description:
Web3 is ushering in the next era of the Internet. However, challenges such as fragmented and non-standardized on-chain data remain. That’s why Footprint Analytics has launched a comprehensive data solution that leverages AI technology to automate blockchain data collection, cleansing, and correlation. This initiative aims to establish cross-chain data standards, making it easier for developers […]

The post How AI converges with Web3: Interview with Footprint Analytics CEO appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Weekly Roundup: Grab Integrates Web3, Wallet, And More
description: The “Uber of Southeast Asia” Grab has announced the integration of Web3 services, allowing users to win blockchain rewards, pay using NFTs, and set up their own Web3 wallet, along with a host of other features.

title: RFK Jr on China and Global Economic Battles; 88,200 Millionaires Got Rich With Crypto, Says Report — Week in Review
description: The first full week of September is in the bag, and there’s nary a shortage of crypto and economic news from across the globe. title: Top Three Tokens To Add to Your Portfolio – Tron (TRX), Decentraland (MANA), Everlodge (ELDG)
description: Investors are on the lookout for cryptos that will return profits in the short and long run. While the market is bouncing back, some tokens are projected to return profit in Q4 of 2023.  These tokens are Tron (TRX), Decentraland (MANA) and Everlodge (ELDG). title: Here’s What Could Signal the End of Current Bitcoin (BTC) Correction, According to Crypto Analyst
description:
